name: Lizzy's Lunch
description:
In this simple game you play as a hungry gecko looking for flies.
You can climb any surface. To control the gecko use WASD or the arrow keys. To eat the flies press SPACE.

Hope you enjoy!

This game was created for the "STOP WAITING FOR GODOT" game jam.

Source:
https://github.com/Norodix/StopWaitingForGodot
